title: Hour 1: How bout them Cowboys
description:
Michael Irvin goes crazy talking about the Cowboys win over the Giants. Keyshawn Johnson breakdowns the biggest reason the Raiders are 0-3 to start the season. Plus Richard Jefferson and Stephen A clash over Kyrie's recent press conference.
